text: Divij Sharan and Ken Skupski were the defending champions but chose not to defend their title. Kevin Krawietz and Albano Olivetti won the title after defeating Ruben Bemelmans and Adrián Menéndez-Maceiras 6–3, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Guzzini Challenger - Doubles Category:Guzzini Challenger
title: 2016 Guzzini Challenger – Doubles
